subject: Halls of Fame
Soccer
organizations: United States Men's National Soccer Team
lead_paragraph: Kristine Lilly, a two-time World Cup champion and winner of two Olympic gold medals, led the inductees to the United States National Soccer Hall of Fame.
snippet: Kristine Lilly, a two-time World Cup champion and winner of two Olympic gold medals, led the inductees to the United States National Soccer Hall of Fame.
